metadata.title: CVE-2013-7075 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The Content Editing Wizards component in TYPO3 4.5.0 through 4.5.31, 4.7.0through 4.7.16, 6.0.0 through 6.0.11, and 6.1.0 through 6.1.6 allows remoteauthenticated backend users to unserialize arbitrary PHP objects, deletearbitrary files, and possibly have other unspecified impacts via anunspecified parameter, related to a "missing signature."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7075` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.32+dfsg1-1').
